data_table.description: MRI Scans and Neuropsychological (NP) Battery Dates and Exclusions for Original Cohort Participants, 1999 - 2012. This dataset contains possible exclusions that can be used when analyzing the datasets t_mrbrnm1_2011_m_0891, t_mrbrnm2_2012_a_0892 and vr_np_2012_a_0893. This dataset contains brain MRI and NP dates for exclusions only. To get a complete set of MRI or NP dates see separate datasets containing test dates.

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Unique study participant identification number

variable.name: nmri
variable.description: Total number of MRI scans

variable.name: nnp
variable.description: Total number of NP batteries

variable.name: np_x25_excludeON
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent other neurological conditions at the time of their NP battery closest to Exam 25

variable.name: mr_x25_excludeON
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent other neurological conditions at the time of their MRI scan closest to Exam 25

variable.name: np1_excludeON
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent other neurological conditions at the time of their first NP battery

variable.name: mr1_excludeON
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent other neurological conditions at the time of their first MRI scan

variable.name: mr1_assoc_np1_excludeON
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent other neurological conditions at the time of their NP battery corresponding to their first MRI scan

variable.name: np_x25_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent dementia at the time of their NP battery closest to Exam 25

variable.name: np_x25_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent stroke at the time of their NP battery closest to Exam 25

variable.name: mr_x25_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent dementia at the time of their MRI scan closest to Exam 25

variable.name: mr_x25_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent stroke at the time of their MRI scan closest to Exam 25

variable.name: np1_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent dementia at the time of their first NP battery

variable.name: np1_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent stroke at the time of their first NP battery

variable.name: mr1_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent dementia at the time of their first MRI scan

variable.name: mr1_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent stroke at the time of their first MRI scan

variable.name: mr1_assoc_np1_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent dementia at the time of their NP battery corresponding to their first MRI scan

variable.name: mr1_assoc_np1_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Participant should be excluded due to prevalent stroke at the time of their NP battery corresponding to their first MRI scan

variable.name: idtype
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study cohort identifier
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form a unique study participant ID number.

variable.name: MR1_assoc_NP1_date
variable.description: Date of participants NP battery that corresponds to their first MRI scan (may not necessarily be the same as their first NP battery date)

variable.name: MR1_date
variable.description: Date of first MRI scan

variable.name: MR_X25_date
variable.description: Date of participant's MRI scan that is closest to Exam 25 (within 1 year before or 5 years after Exam 25 date)

variable.name: NP1_date
variable.description: Date of first NP battery

variable.name: NP_X25_date
variable.description: Date of participant's NP battery that is closest to Exam 25 (within 1 year before or 5 years after Exam 25 date)
